Post Title: Highland Park Room for Rent $895 utilities additional  - available now
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Room (unfurnished) available for rent (now) at $895/month. Utilities $100/mth. Maid service additional cost of approx $30/month. Looking for courteous long term tenant/roommate.
Room 11'6" x 10'
Close to York, Figueroa's main strip, Highland Park Metro station approx. 1/4 mile away - walking distance. Accessible by 110 freeway (approx. 0.5 miles), 2, 134, 210, & 5.
Smoking outside acceptable.

The house is a 1920's craftsman 3/2 with many amenities:
High speed internet
Washer and Dryer in house
Dishwasher
Backyard with deck
Backyard garden boxes
Front Patio
House furnished
Room un-furnished
Shared bathroom with vintage claw tub
Fully stocked kitchen (pots/pans)
Plenty of street parking

I do have a med/small dog and cat, so if you are allergic ; /
- we are not interested in having any more animals in the house. Current resident's in their late 20’s & late 30's.

Due to the Covid19 pandemic, we will do phone interviews & FaceTime house tours prior to home visits. We are looking for someone who will be respectful of the fact that there is a illness going around. Meaning during this time: not bringing outside guests into the home, practicing social distancing, practicing stay at home orders, practicing clean practices due to shared living spaces etc...

If you have questions don't hesitate to ask.
show contact info
-Cynthia

Post Title: 2BD/1BA/Apartment in Historic Highland Park Home, walk to Figueroa
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

2BD/1BA Flat in the second floor of a historic home built in the 1880s in the northeast of LA. This home is located in Los Angeles's oldest neighborhood:
Highland Park. One block from AVE 56 and Figueroa st. 2 1/2 blocks from the Gold Line Station. Very walkable!
Walk to the metro, restaurants/bars, coffee shops, and art galleries.This home is a duplex. You will be renting the entire unit on the second floor. The unit has its own private entrance

High speed wifi
A complete kitchen with gas stove
Full size washer and dryer
CENTRAL AC/HEAT system
Ceiling fans in every room

$2,700 per month
One month security deposit and first month to move in.

Post Title: 2BD/1BA/Apartment in Historic Highland Park Home, walk to Figueroa
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

2BD/1BA Flat in the second floor of a historic home built in the 1880s in the northeast of LA. This home is located in Los Angeles's oldest neighborhood:
Highland Park. One block from AVE 56 and Figueroa st. 2 1/2 blocks from the Gold Line Station. Very walkable!
Walk to the metro, restaurants/bars, coffee shops, and art galleries.This home is a duplex. You will be renting the entire unit on the second floor. The unit has its own private entrance

High speed wifi
A complete kitchen with gas stove
Full size washer and dryer
CENTRAL AC/HEAT system
Ceiling fans in every room

$2,700 per month
One month security deposit and first month to move in.

Contact David show contact info

Post Title: Reduced - Large 3br/2ba Apt Highland Park
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Rent Reduced to $2,495

Highland Park is the hottest neighborhood in Los Angeles due to its proximity to downtown Los Angeles, Pasadena, Eagle Rock and Glendale. This building is located in the Northern-most tip of Highland Park, adjacent and easily accessible to Pasadena and all it offers. Plus it is freeway close via I-110 to downtown Los Angeles, making it a perfect cost-effective alternative to downtown Los Angeles living.

This a rarely-available 3 bedroom/2 full bath unit in a 10 unit 1991 building, and includes central a/c, new paint, new flooring and window coverings. Refrigerator. This is a secured-access building with gated and covered parking for 2 vehicles, on a rare culdesac street in the best of the best neighborhood in Highland Park.

This unit is available now to show, and we are taking scheduling viewing and taking applications. Photos are of a comparable unit in the building.

Please call/text Anwar to schedule a viewing. There are not many of these 3 bedroom/2 full bath apartment units around, that are perfect for roommate situations, and it is not expected to last long.

Post Title: July/August room sublet in Highland Park
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

One bedroom available for July and August. This lease is up in September but will have an option to renew. This is a 3 bedroom house. Two other women live here and work from home. This is a private room but shares a bathroom with one other roommate. The room also has a large closet. The house is newly remodeled and is a beautiful space to live in! This cute house is in an ideal location in Highland Park. Located off of York Blvd - in walking distance to the gold line, Occidental College, and many restaurants/bars/coffee shops. It has a gated side and front yard. The living room and kitchen are furnished but the bedroom will be empty. Street parking is available. Washer/dryer in unit. Calm, easy going, and very clean roommates - would be looking for the same! I have loved living in this house for 2 years but am relocating. Rent is $900 per month plus utilities. Please email me with a description of who you are and your living style.

Post Title: Stunning Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartments in Highland Park
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Black Pine Flats brings a curated collection of newly renovated apartment residences to the heart of Highland Park. Featuring designer touches and hand-crafted details, Black Pine Flats is just steps away from Figueroa St., Highland Park’s vibrant main street. The proximity to Figueroa offers an eclectic array of choices featuring coffee shops, boutiques, bars and restaurants. The Avenue 57 Metro stop is two blocks away offering quick gold line access to downtown LA and Pasadena.

***Contact Stephanie at show contact info via text to schedule a tour***

We can't wait to show you around, schedule your showing today!

FEATURES:
- Newly renovated
- New bathroom sink, vanity, floor tiles
- New flooring throughout
- New light fixtures
- New appliances
- Spacious unit sizes
- Upgraded common areas
- Building laundry and dryers
- Large outdoor common space
- Highly walkable neighborhood
- Air conditioning in most units
- Washer and Dryers in most units
- Assigned parking
- Gated parking lot
- Pet friendly
- Owner pays water and trash


Nearby Figueroa Street offers some of LA’s best dining and retail that is walkable from Benner Square. Examples include the Blind Barber, Civil Coffee, and Triple Beam Pizza. KitchenMouse is a welcoming, warm vegetarian café that’s menu includes award-winning vegan and gluten free pancakes. Highland Park Bowl is LA’s oldest bowling alley. The cool retro-venue offers locally brewed beers and some of the city’s best pizza. There’s also Highland Park staples such as the deli/speakeasy TinFoil, Café Birdie and Vietnamese soul food restaurant Good Girl Dinette. Benner Square is conveniently close to the 110 freeway and a few blocks away from the Avenue 57 Metro Gold Line, giving quick access to downtown LA and Pasadena.

Check out our website for more photos and information about the neighborhood: www.BlackPineFlats.com

***Contact Stephanie at show contact info via text to schedule a tour***

Location:
376 N Ave 57,
Los Angeles, CA 90042

Lovely 2-bedroom apartment in Highland Park, Los Angeles.
June 1st move-in, but the date is flexible. Tenant can move in before then, or up to June 15th as desired.

Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Rent Reduced to $2,450

Highland Park is the hottest neighborhood in Los Angeles due to its proximity to downtown Los Angeles, Pasadena, Eagle Rock and Glendale. This building is located in the Northern-most tip of Highland Park, adjacent and easily accessible to Pasadena and all it offers. Plus it is freeway close via I-110 to downtown Los Angeles, making it a perfect cost-effective alternative to downtown Los Angeles living.

This a rarely-available 3 bedroom/2 full bath unit in a 10 unit 1991 building, and includes central a/c, new paint, new flooring and window coverings. Refrigerator. Post Title: Highland Park 1 bedroom with Bonus Room
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Located in a prime location of Highland Park, close to shops, restaurants, transportation. With its walk-able streets, Craftsman and Victorian-style houses and small town feel, Highland Park is one of the most blossoming neighborhoods in Los Angeles. The neighborhood is filled with artists, musicians, actors and writers who enjoy upgrading their fashionable old homes and walking the main drag of Figueroa or York Boulevards. Just a few blocks to coffee houses, restaurants, bars and nightlife. This building is nestled in a tree lined street among. One-half block from the Arroyo Seco Parkway (110 freeway). Close to South Pasadena and 10 Minutes from DTLA. Served by Metro Gold Line, Highland Park bus lines. Apartment is a spacious Mid Century 1 bedroom + BONUS ROOM, located behind a security gate with 2 parking spaces. freshly painted , gleaming hardwood floors, and lots of storage. Post Title: Couple’s Beachtown Get-away
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Enjoy ocean view and the close proximity to the vibrant and upscale shopping and dining of Downtown Manhattan Beach and Hermosa Beach. Ocean view deck with Spirit Weber gas grill, sun porch, oak wood floors, T&G open-beam ceilings, free standing mid century modern Aztec fireplace, vintage custom kitchen cabinets with yellow hex counter tops, modern appliances, washer/dryer, outdoor hot shower and 1 car garage parking.
NO PETS. NO SMOKING.
Utilities included.
FURNISHED monthly vacation rental.
Prices range from $3,500-$4,200 depending on the time of year and the duration of your stay.

Visit Disneyland Park, Universal Studios Hollywood, Hollywood sign, Santa Monica Pier, Griffith Observatory, the Getty museum, LACMA, Hollywood Boulevard, the Queen Mary,

Walk or bike easily to DT Manhattan Beach or Hermosa Beach. Visit Vons, trendy restaurants/bars, and boutiques in both towns or visit our local Boccato’s market just 4 blocks away – as well as Brother’s Burritos & Bowls, dry cleaners, Pilates, hair salon, unlimited fitness, liquor, and La Penita.

Nearby Green Belt, bike path, volleyball nets, pickle ball, golf courses, parks, and bike, kayak & boat rentals. Quaint and safe beach town. Award-winning restaurants that are just a short walk away.

Close to Redondo Beach, Palos Verdes, boat to Catalina Island, El Segundo, Playa del Rey, Silicon Beach, Westchester, LAX, 405, 105.

Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

LOCATED IN THE THRIVING ENTERTAINMENT DISTRICT OF PARAMOUNT STUDIOS/HOLLYWOOD/HANCOCK PARK ADJACENT, 717 N. Highland Ave., these carefully designed Loft spaces provide a true Live - Work opportunity as allowed under the commercial C2 Zone. This unit features 3-level (town homes) lofts approximately 2,000 usable sq., ft. in size with open floor layout and appx 24 ft high ceiling emphasizing light, space and contemporary design. This exclusive Live/Work Loft features hardwood maple floors, separate heating/air conditioning systems, exposed block walls, double insulated wood windows with a view, large exterior decks, vaulted ceilings with open beam construction, steel interior stairways. Kitchen and bathroom are fully equipped with new high-standard appliances and fixtures. Each individual unit has private two-car garage/work space with 11-ft ceilings. The building is fully placed with an exterior gate. Each unit is wired for today's security and communication intercom.

Post Title: 409 S HIGHLAND AVE LOS ANGELES CA 90036
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Secluded behind lush greenery and a romantic gate awaits this stunning, 1920s Spanish dream. Situated in Hancock Park, the home is located just moments from the Wilshire Country Club, local shops, restaurants and more. An inviting living room greets you with beautiful crown molding details, oversized windows and brick fireplace. Light & bright, the kitchen boasts a butcher block center island, farmhouse sink, top-of-the-line appliances & elegant white cabinetry. The luxurious & spacious master features grand windows for an abundance of natural light, walk-in closet w/ built-ins & a marble bath with sleek wood accents, glass shower, soaker tub & dual sink vanity. Feel as if you are in a tropical locale, in the resort-like yard, enveloped by mature palms w/ a sparkling pool/spa, firepit & pergola. Additional amenities include guest rooms, bonus room/den for playroom or office, detached guest house, formal dining room and more. This Hancock Park gem is truly a rare offering.

Post Title: Sublet Room with seperate Bathroom
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

A sublet room with a separate bathroom for rent in a duplex (house like), tacked in the hill of Mt. Washington. Cross streets: Figueroa/Avenue 37 (area code 90065).

Rental period up to 5 months.


The room comes furnished and includes: your own bathroom, closet, comfortable futon style bed (flat and queen size when opened), shelving, desk, lamps. The items to be left in the room can be discussed upon rental.


You would be able to use the kitchen with its all amenities, dining and living area, as well as a very cool backyard.


Very lovely hilly area all around, nice hiking and vistas just steps away from the house. It’s like living in the wilderness but in the city in the same time.


Super close to two mayor freeways 5, 110 that connect nearly with 101, 2 and 134. Conveniently located, walking distance 3 minutes to Metro station. Street parking.

There would be a small dog Jack in the house (very cool, quiet and mellow) but he sheds a bit though.

Rent $1290/month + $70 utilities.
Deposit $1290.

Look forward to hearing from you.

Post Title: Large Furnished Room With Private Entrance/Private bath! 1200
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Spacious room for rent for long or short term rental in highly coveted Highland Park neighborhood! This is the ideal space for someone seeking a very private environment with all the amenities of a house.
Large light-filled room comes fully furnished with desk, full size bed, dresser, mini fridge, microwave, and TV. Room features hardwood floors, A/C, large sliding glass door closet, and private back entrance. Pleasant outdoor back area with picnic table, grill, and a hammock, perfect for dinner parties or entertaining! You would have your own private bathroom located in the hallway. Fully equipped kitchen for all your cooking needs, as well as large washer/dryer. You would also have your own permanent parking spot in front of the house, permit-free and hassle-free. House is located within walking distance to York Blvd where you can find plenty of cute shops, brunch spots and bars.

$1200 a month includes water, gas, electricity, wifi, cable and trash.
$700 security deposit.
Quick allergy note: we do have two large fluffy cats and a small long-haired dog. As long as you keep your doors closed they shouldn't be a nuisance. 

No pets preferred but willing a consider a small dog in exchange for mutual pet-sitting arrangement :) We are a male-female couple in our 30's who mostly work from home. The room will be available starting Tuesday May 25.  Please include a bit about yourself in your email!

***BE AWARE there is a scam going around with people stealing photos of listings. This ad has been reposted using the email address wallamanda66gmail.com and using 6149 Mt Angelus Dr, Los Angeles as the address-- THAT IS NOT REAL!*** Be cautious!

Room for rent in Eagle Rock house with 5bdrm 2bath AVAILABLE: First week of June 2021

We have one roommate moving at the end of the week. He still have personal things in the room but pretty much don't stay there anymore. He still paid till the end of the month of May. As soon as he's moved out, we need to clean the room and apply a fresh paint to the walls and ceilings. AND the other roommate currently occupying the smaller room wants to upgrade to the bigger room. So his current room will be available and we are interested in finding someone soon to take over his room. We are only looking for ONE person to rent the room... you will be living with 4 people and 2 dogs and 6 backyard chickens. For rent, its $620 to rent the room and add the utilities and shared stuff... previous roommate was paying between $780 to $880/month which included the rent, utilities and share of house expenses.

I have attached pictures of the house, the upstairs bathroom, upstairs living room, bathroom and bedroom. The pictures of the pictures are however from a year ago before previous roommate moved in. Roommate still occupies the room.


*About the House*
+ two story house with 5bdrm, 2bathroom in Eagle Rock
+ Shared common space: kitchen, living room, patio, backyard, bathrooms, spacious patio, backyard
+ Dishwasher in the kitchen, washer and dryer downstairs
+ 4 people and 2 dogs live here and you'll be the 5th roommate
+ we have backyard chickens
+ plenty of street parking
+ There are 2 bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs and 3 bedrooms and a bathroom downstairs
+ 3 people live downstairs and 1 + you will be upstairs
+ plenty of street parking
+ located in Eagle Rock, CA 90041
+ close to 134/210/2 freeway
+ near the intersection of Colorado Blvd and Figueroa Blvd, behind Vons
+ close to Pasadena, Highland Park, Glendale, Burbank, Rose Bowl
+ Colleges close are occidental and pasadena city college

*About the Room*
+ Private, Unfurnished bedroom upstairs with windows. Window AC Unit.
+ Built in Closet. Built in Dresser
+ Room size = 11.5 x 8ft
+ Shared upstairs bathroom

* About the Roommates*
+ You'll be living with 4 new roommates and 2 pitbull dogs (12 years old and a 1.5 year old).
+ Tim and Ron (gay married couple 38/35yo who owns the dogs) have the room downstairs Work for the airlines and entertainment industry.
+ Forest is a teacher who rent a room downstairs
+ Duncan rents the upstairs room and shares the upstairs bathroom with you. He is the one who currently rents your room but he will be moving in to the bigger room
+ We all are covid19 vaccined
+ 2 dogs are Melody (1.5yo) and Molly (12 yo)


*Looking for:*
- Professional or College Student is a plus
- Must be Clean, Independent, Quiet, Pays rent on time
Must be ok with dogs and having chickens in the backyard
- 420/Gay/Pets-friendly
- clean up after your self
- looking more for long term


*Miscellaneous*
- NO SMOKING or DRUGS inside the house; Smoking weed or occasional cigar in outside back patio is OK... please no cigarettes
- NO PETS (we already have 2 dogs and hens in the backyard - and occasional dog visitors)
- NO PARTIES
- NO OVERNIGHT GUESTS

*Rent Payments*
$620 per month + Utilities (approximately ~ $150 per person per month)
$620 1st month rent plus $620 Security Deposit plus $650 last month rent
$1,860 to move in

----Utilities NOT included in the $620/month rent (we split the cost between the total occupants of 5 which runs to about $150-$200/per person) ----
Premium Cable and wifi (AT&T Uverse)
Water, Electricity, Trash (LADWP)
Gas (Socalgas)
Cleaning Ladies (comes every 2 weeks to clean the kitchen, common area and bathrooms - Friday Mornings)
We also share the cost of necessary items like: Toilet paper, paper towels, napkins, kitchen soap, hand soap, laundry shop, etc



*Interested?*

Email with your contact info (a phone number to call preferred), a little bit about yourself in regards to age, work/school schedule and share your facebook/instagram/social media links so we can get to know you better faster.
What's your living situation now? Are you able to pay about $850 to $950/per month for rent no problem?
Whats your occupation/job/career?

Post Title: Pretty, Sunny, Entire House with Big Garden-Avail. July 1
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

I'm renting a lovely, much beloved and very peaceful and clean 1100 sq. ft, 2 bedroom house with kitchen, living room, dining room, bathroom, large patio, a nice garden. I'm looking to rent it to a nice person (s) for 1-2 months.
Dates can be worked out between us.

The home is a 1930's stand alone house nestled at the base of Monterey Hills. Features a private, gated 5000 sq ft garden with plenty of space to play, exercise, relax or have a meal al fresco. Private, gated parking on site. Hardwood floors, lots of light, W/D, central air and heat. Fully stocked kitchen with everything you might need including toaster oven, dishwasher, microwave, etc. The house has just been painted and is very clean. It has wifi, new washer/dryer--everything. Very private, quiet.

I'm looking for the right person or folks to enjoy and respect my space and take good care of a home I love, possibly including some mellow succulent watering. Thank you!!

Dates: Can be worked out between us, can be pro rated weekly. The main thing is that I am looking for someone who can commit to a minimum of 1 month and max of 2 months. Ideal dates would start around July 1.

Rent is $2950/month not including utilities. I'll consider lowering rent a bit if the 2nd bedroom stays as an office as it is now. Please, no pets (I'm allergic). Smoking outside is okay. Please write an email and tell me a little about yourself and why you might need a place to stay in LA. Happy to do a virtual tour. Thank you.

Post Title: @@@Furnished Home with Spacious Garden & Porches - Available from ###
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

We have a spacious, fully furnished Mediterranean-styled retreat that is located at the convergence of the hippest neighborhoods in L.A. – Glassell Park, Eagle Rock and Highland Park, and within two blocks from the beautiful Occidental College campus. Within a short walk from restaurants, taco trucks, cafés and grocery stores, this rejuvenating oasis offers a generous garden, plus front and back porches. Parking & utilities included!

A 800 sq. real one-bed, one-bath unit in a duplex. Each unit is well insulated from one another. Ample of outdoor spaces accessible ONLY from this unit (not shared): 200+ sq. porch spaces, plus the garden area, in a 7,500 sqft. lot. An outdoor bistro set and chairs are ready for your enjoyment.

Entering the casa, the interior is decorated with gorgeous cherry wood flooring. The living-dining room comes with a 43-inch smart TV, wicker sofa, dining table and chairs.

The open kitchen plan comes with appliances - stove, microwave, refrigerator and dish washer. In-unit washer and dryer is right at the corner next to the kitchen.

As a home office, it features a long desk, ready-to-use printer and strong fiber-optic Wi-Fi (100+ mbps).

The terra-cotta tiled bathroom has two sinks. The toilet and bath tub area is separated by a French sliding door.

Post Title: Stylish Home with Spacious Garden & Porches - Available from 7/24
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

View virtual tour: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=9Efn2EWUNg3
(copy & paste link to browser)

We have a spacious, fully furnished Mediterranean-styled retreat that is located at the convergence of the hippest neighborhoods in L.A. – Glassell Park, Eagle Rock and Highland Park, and within two blocks from the beautiful Occidental College campus. Within a short walk from restaurants, taco trucks, cafés and grocery stores, this rejuvenating oasis offers a generous garden, plus front and back porches. Parking & utilities included!

A 800 sq. real one-bed, one-bath unit in a duplex. Each unit is well insulated from one another. Ample of outdoor spaces accessible ONLY from this unit (not shared): 200+ sq. porch spaces, plus the garden area, in a 7,500 sqft. lot. An outdoor bistro set and chairs are ready for your enjoyment.

Entering the casa, the interior is decorated with gorgeous cherry wood flooring. The living-dining room comes with a 43-inch smart TV, wicker sofa, dining table and chairs.

The open kitchen plan comes with appliances - stove, microwave, refrigerator and dish washer. In-unit washer and dryer is right at the corner next to the kitchen.

As a home office, it features a long desk, ready-to-use printer and strong fiber-optic Wi-Fi (100+ mbps).

The terra-cotta tiled bathroom has two sinks. The toilet and bath tub area is separated by a French sliding door.

This energy-efficient casa is well insulated and soundproofed. Indoor temperature remains fairly stable throughout the day. Central air conditioning and heat is controlled by the smart Ecobee thermostat, ensuring comfort.

The bedroom comes with a queen-size bed, dimmable recessed lights and a pair of nightstand lamps with USB chargers and A/C outlets. Stepping out from the bedroom is the 120 sq. rear porch, with stairs that lead to the garden. It has a great view of the beautiful sunset and skyline of surrounding hills!

Even it is just minutes away from SR-2 and I-5, and near the intersection of Eagle Rock and York Boulevards, this house is located on a quiet street and a family-friendly neighborhood. There are many restaurants, cafés and stores within walking distance.

Occidental College is just a short walk. Dodger Stadium, Downtown LA, Hollywood, Glendale and South Pasadena are all within a 10-15 minutes drive. It is centrally located in a car city, with public transportation options and easy transfers to Metro Rail!

If you are a biker, you would enjoy the bicycle-friendly neighborhood with designated bike lanes along York and Eagle Rock Boulevards, that would take you to other parts of town such as South Pasadena, Glendale, Frogtown, and further down to Downtown LA!

All utilities included: water, electricity, gas, trash, gardening and fiber-optic Wi-Fi. Available for up to two person (a $200 additional rent for two) and pet rent is $90 per month for each pet. We welcome a short-term lease from one to six months (longer is also possible).

** Available from July 24. Feel free to reply with a little bit about yourself and the purpose of your stay, and we will go from there!
Neighborhood: (Eagle Rock, Occidental College and Highland Park)

Post Title: 2 BR, 1 BA unique hillside home
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Please text the current tenant, Susana for a viewing, three2three 4zero4 forty-four30. Available June 16th.

Beautiful 2 BR, 1 Bath upstairs unit for rent in a large 2-story hillside home in Silver Lake that has been converted to a duplex (each floor is its own separate/private unit). The unit has 1100 sq.ft. of space in an open floor plan with a unique lofted lounging area in the living room (this is not one of the bedrooms). 2 bedrooms on opposite sides of the unit and a bathroom with dual sinks makes it perfect for roommates too. The unit includes AC and heat, shared (free) laundry room and firepit/patio/garden area outside, safe and fully enclosed behind locked gate access (well-behaved pets allowed!), and permit street parking directly in front of the house that runs about $15/ year for an annual pass or you can park on side streets for free if you don’t mind a short walk. Stair-only access from the street is not fit for physically disabled.

The house is in Silver Lake, where the I-5 and SR-2 meet, a hipster mecca, offering easy access to all points in the city. Want to go to a Dodger's game, see the Hollywood star walk, visit Universal Studios or check out the nightlife in downtown LA? The property neighbors a lot of LA hotspots for shopping, dining, entertainment & nightlife, including Atwater Village, Glendale, Sunset Junction, Echo Park, Eagle Rock, Highland Park, Hollywood, and downtown LA. There's a bus stop steps away from the front gate and 10 minute walk to groceries, restaurants, banks, library, bar, dog park, and plenty of outdoor recreation (Silver Lake resorvoir, LA River bike path, Griffith and Ellysian parks).

$2500/month (up to 2 adults, $100/mo more for each additional adult occupant) + utilities (split equally among the number of people living in the house)
$2500 refundable deposit (applied to any overdue utilities, damages and/or cleaning costs at move-out)
Move-in Requirements: $35 online application for credit/background, 3 references (work, personal & former landlord/roommate you've paid rent to), proof of income (pay stubs or bank statements), copy of ID, 1st month rent & deposit (total of $5000), and 1-year lease.

Please contact the current tenant, Susana for a viewing, three2three 4zero4 forty-four30. If you're interested in applying after the viewing or have any questions, please email the owner, Crystal, by responding to this ad (Susana can also provide you with contact details at the viewing). Thanks and happy hunting!

Post Title: Charming 1 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, Large Side Unit for Rent
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

The unit is a side unit addition to the main house. The unit has its own private entry, parking space with gate (featured in photos) and only shares one wall with the main house. There is a shared laundry and dryer on site.

Renters in the side unit would live as neighbors to us (we are also renters and live in the main house). We are a couple in our 30's with a 2 year old boy. We love the location, space, and having our family here. We are looking for a single person (or couple) who will be a respectful and friendly neighbor and easy to communicate with about our shared space. The property is smoke free (cigarettes).

The side unit for rent has one large living room with a large closet, full bathroom, and kitchen, and one large bedroom with: 2 closets, a private full bathroom, and a side nook with a window which could be used for a office/desk. It's very spacious for a single person but has been occupied by a couple as well. The property as a whole has a front and back yard, with lovely trees and flowers. The photo's featured have the current tenants belongings. The space is not furnished.

Located in a prime area of Highland Park, this side unit is on a quiet residential street, but is extremely close to shops/coffee/yoga/bars/Highland Park Theater on Figueroa St. It is also a short walk (1/2 mile) to the Gold Line Metro and Dash bus. It is 10 minutes to downtown by car and less than 15 minutes by train. We use the train all the time. Additionally, Ernest Debs Regional Park is right in our backyard and only a short walk to the trails up the hills of the park.

Rent for the side unit is $1850 per month (+ 1 month deposit). This does not include utilities, which are split between the main house and side unit. The unit is available for move-in July 1st, but could be made available sooner if needed.

Please email with a little bit of information about yourself, including what type of living situation you are looking for, what you do for work in Los Angeles, your age, and whether or not you are seeking the unit for yourself or as a couple. Let us know if you have any questions. We will email you back to set up a time to view the unit.

Post Title: Architectural Gem in 1922 Spanish Court
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Beautiful completely detached house in 1922 Spanish Court! The Court is a designated historic property and has tremendous charm with original 1920's elements. The yard boasts a lovely garden with zero-scape and citrus trees and an impressive heritage iris collection in the spring. The apartment is located in the rear of the court and is very quiet, private, and peaceful. There is a small garden space in the exterior. You are steps away from wonderful nature walks and hikes and yet close to great restaurants, cafes, and coffee shops on Figueroa and York. The unit is one-block away from the Southwest Museum metro stop on the Gold-line in Mt. Washington. There is ample street parking (with no parking restrictions).

The address is 4317 Marmion Way, LA, CA 90065. Interior tours will be starting June 20 & 21, 2021. Exterior tours and video tours are available immediately. Please call or text John at show contact info to make an appointment.

Post Title: Private Large Furnished Room  for long or short term rental
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Spacious room for rent for long or short term rental in highly coveted Highland Park neighborhood! This is the ideal space for someone seeking a very private environment with all the amenities of a house.

Large light-filled room comes fully furnished with desk, full size bed, dresser, mini fridge, microwave, and TV. Room features hardwood floors, A/C, large sliding glass door closet, and private back entrance. Pleasant outdoor back area with picnic table, grill, and a hammock, perfect for dinner parties or entertaining! You would have your own private bathroom located in the hallway. Fully equipped kitchen for all your cooking needs, as well as large washer/dryer. You would also have your own permanent parking spot in front of the house, permit-free and hassle-free. House is located within walking distance to York Blvd where you can find plenty of cute shops, brunch spots and bars.
$600 a month includes water, gas, electricity, wifi, cable and trash.

Post Title: High Above Downtown
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This Old World styled Italian built Duplex sits at the rear of a Large Lot. There is a Shared Front Yard perfect for gardening. There is a Shared Driveway for 3 cars.
There is a nice Hilltop Breeze. Unit is very Private and comes clean with fresh paint.
It has a Historic Kitchen and Bathroom.
Tenants to the Right side are very quiet and peaceful. We would like to retain this calmness in the spirit of peace.

This is a very safe community with many different ethnicities and age groups.
This Unit is Literally less than 1 mile from Downtown, best described by its landmarks, Chinatown to the Left, Echo Park to the right, Dodger Stadium behind and Downtown in front.
There are a number of Wild Peacocks that live on the hill.
We prefer a non-smoker willing to sign a one year lease.

Please Text or Call Joe at show contact info

Post Title: Large Furnished Room With Private Entrance/Private bath! 1200
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Spacious room for rent for long or short term rental in highly coveted Highland Park neighborhood! This is the ideal space for someone seeking a very private environment with all the amenities of a house.

Large light-filled room comes fully furnished with desk, full size bed, dresser, mini fridge, microwave, and TV. Room features hardwood floors, A/C, large sliding glass door closet, and private back entrance. Pleasant outdoor back area with picnic table, grill, and a hammock, perfect for dinner parties or entertaining! You would have your own private bathroom located in the hallway. Fully equipped kitchen for all your cooking needs, as well as large washer/dryer. You would also have your own permanent parking spot in front of the house, permit-free and hassle-free. House is located within walking distance to York Blvd where you can find plenty of cute shops, brunch spots and bars.
$1200 a month includes water, gas, electricity, wifi, cable and trash.
$700 security deposit.

Quick allergy note: we do have two large fluffy cats and a small long-haired dog. As long as you keep your doors closed they shouldn't be a nuisance. Room will be available starting Tuesday May 21.

***BE AWARE there is a scam going around with people stealing photos of listings. This ad has been reposted using the email address wallamanda66gmail.com and using 6149 Mt Angelus Dr, Los Angeles as the address-- THAT IS NOT REAL!*** Be cautious!

Post Title: 3 BED 2 BA HOME, LIVE/WORK, BEST STREET
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

On the best street in the lower Hollywood Hills, surrounded by classic Spanish style homes, near Wattles Estate and park. A midcentury one story home, upgraded , private. Our wonderful tenants of 11 years bought a home, and are moving out May 28. It will be ready for you to move in June 01, 2021.

$3,950 for one adult add $250/month for a second adult. TWO IS THE LIMIT. Young scholars are welcome,
no extra fee. Gardner Street skool is a few blocks away (that was Michael Jackson's school.)

Country living in the middle of Hollywood, GREEN AND QUIET YET CLOSE TO ALL.
BEST LOCATION IN THE LOWER HOLLYWOOD HILLS. We know, because the two co-owners/landlords
have their homes a block away, been living here for decades.
Your future home is surrounded by a tall wooden fence. Private and quiet.
At the back there is a 1+ 1 wing, but this is all one house. You only share the laundry room. The other tenant is
a mature, single man, no noise, no parties.
Our street is in the lower Hollywood Hills, [above Hollywood Blvd., halfway between Fairfax and La Brea] on a quiet, cul de sac street of vintage Spanish style homes. Green views of the surrounding hills, hardly any traffic, yet walk just one long block to a bus stop, two more blocks get you to shops and restaurants on Sunset Blvd., a longer walk to Hollywood and Highland, restaurants, shopping, markets, Metro station, Kodak-Dolby, and El Capitan theaters, clubs (when they re-open soon) .. Hiking trails in the hill above you ....
Our dead end little canyon was subdivided in the 1920s, and has been a favorite of Hollywood folks since then. The home directly across the street was Russ Columbo's (**).
Several other names lived around here, and in this house too. (Who? It is bad form to drop names, as I was told by George Clooney).

LOOKING FOR ONE OR TWO RESPONSIBLE, QUIET PERSONS, WITH GOOD REFS.,
NON [INDOORS] SMOKING. PERFECT FOR WORK FROM HOME, (IT HAS A HUGE OFFICE/STUDIO).

Front and side fenced yards. As you enter, to one side the living room with hardwood floor, a wood burning fireplace. To the other side, the dining room. A corridor runs to the back of the house. On one side,
The KITCHEN is large, tile floor, upgraded cabinets.
Next is the master BATHROOM, all tiled, with a skylight, and the MAIN BEDROOM, hardwood floor, large
closet, and a door to the side yard and the laundry room.
On the other side of the corridor- bedroom #2, bedroom #3, bathroom #2, and at the end a 400 sq. foot
studio/office/ work room, all tiled floor, direct exits to the side yards.
Use it for anything that is not noisy ( no loud music, no loud power tools etc.)

There is a beautiful and little known city park across the street.[the WATTLES MANSION ESTATE. Google it.].
Green hills views all around. Hiking/jogging roads and trails just above the house. Join your landlady and a neighbor on their morning walks).

Plenty of street parking. [Not even a 'street cleaning day' restriction].

A bus stop is two blocks away, on the corner of Curson Ave. and Hollywood Blvd.

YOUR PET:
Cats rule. No charge.

If you have a DOG, it needs to be small, silent, and with disposition cool to lethargic....
Fido has to audition and- if successfully cast - pay $35 per month [no additional security deposit].
The yard is fenced. Let Fido roam.

please email, or TEXT (only) Yoram, at 3two3, 3three3, 7three 07. PLEASE include your name and some info about yourself.


Thank you.


( ** )https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russ_Columbo
Neighborhood: (1865 NORTH CURSON AVENUE LOWER  HOLLYWOOD HILLS)

Post Title: Simple Bachelor Pad with AC | Gated and Retrofitted Building, Pool
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Simple Bachelor Pad with AC | Gated and Retrofitted Building, Community Pool

4375 York Blvd #124, Los Angeles CA 90041

Simple bachelor pad! This ground level unit has been updated recently - it features hardwood (pergo) flooring, AC, and tiny kitchenette with newer stainless steel fridge. If you work a lot and tired of roommates, this is a great spot to have your own flat. Laundry on site & community pool. Property is gated. Street parking.

Located super close to lot's of local hot spots: Cafe de Leche, Habitat, Swork, and Occidental College to name a few. Eat, shop, and hang out on the warm evenings - right around the corner. Its location also puts you super close to Highland Park, Pasadena, Downtown, Echo Park and Los Feliz.

Lease Terms: one year minimum lease, deposit same as rent, sorry, no pets please, water paid, shared coin laundry.

Qualification Criteria for Renting: all adults above 18 years old to apply, credit score 650+, verifiable steady income 3 times the monthly rent, great rental history, one year minimum lease, etc.

Post Title: Central Los Feliz Location.  Downstairs Unit w/Shared Yard & Parking
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Awesome Central Location in Los Feliz. Downstairs Unit w/Shared Yard & $2 Monthly Parking

4635 Prospect Ave, Los Angeles CA 90027

This is the perfect location in the center of it ALL! Enjoy the variety of shops and cafes in the Village and Sunset Junction not to mention the local theaters like the Vista and Los Feliz! Hidden behind lush trees, this lower unit is waiting for you! It features the coolest gallery-style hallway (perfect to feature your artwork and photography), high ceilings, and pergo wood floors. The unique layout provides a sense of privacy between three cozy bedrooms with large closets and one and a half bathrooms. The eat-in kitchen comes with appliances: fridge, stove and dishwasher. It's the perfect opportunity to get in touch with your inner chef. Also included: on-site laundry, one parking space AND a shared front yard - this is a great place to kick back and relax on a lazy summer evening. Owner pays for water. 1 parking space can be rented for $2 monthly. Additional parking space can be rented for $50 monthly based on availability. Sorry, no pets. Available for immediate movein.

Renovated amazingly beautiful 4 bed / 4 bath (wow!) bungalow-style unit full of windows and lots of outdoor space to enjoy! Solid hardwood flooring throughout, open airy kitchen/living space, 3 ensuite baths & one bath for guests ~ in-unit washer dryer, AC and tons of patio space, plus parking!

Rent: $3400 ($3900 with $500 off per month for 12 months)

Unit Features:
-Washer / Dryer
-Bungalow-style unit in fourplex (no neighbors above or below)
-End unit (only one shared wall)
-3 beds have ensuite baths
-Large deck out front PLUS each bedroom has its own side deck right off the bedroom!
-All appliances included
-Pet-friendly with no pet rent! (2 pet max / must be approved by mgmt)

Neighborhood:
Walking distance to Guisados, George's Burger Stand , Al & Bea's and Weird Wave Coffee! Just a short bike ride to all the amazing bars, restaurants and coffee shops in the DTLA Arts District like Bestia, Pizzanista, Church + State, Stumptown and more! The 1st/Soto Metro Station is only .4 miles away.

Adaptive Realty is a progressive management company based in Los Angeles. We specialize in sensitive renovations of historic buildings located in Echo Park, Silver Lake, Highland Park, and Lincoln Heights. Renters love our apartments, but, sadly, scammers do, too. Post Title: Room Available in 3Br/2Ba Apartment - June 1st
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Hey Y'all!

Looking to fill a room in a great apartment in Montecito Heights starting June 1st. 1 year lease preferred.

ABOUT THE APARTMENT:
- 3Br/2Ba
- Lower level, off-street unit in a 3 unit triplex
- fully remodeled in 2018 with new flooring, appliances, and fixtures
- 1 group of tenants since remodel
- High ceilings, tons of natural light
- 3 off-street parking spots
- Central AC/heating
- Large outdoor space (currently with picnic table, potted garden, and grill)
- Friendly, quiet neighbors

ABOUT THE ROOM:
Rent: $900/mo + wifi/utilities ($60-90/mo depending on AC use)
- 12’ x 9’
- Larger of the two secondary bedrooms
- NW facing windows w/ abundant afternoon light
- Bathroom shared with one person

PROS:
- 12 mins to USC's Health Sciences Campus (LAC+USC, Keck Hospital) at all hours
- Great offsite landlord who promptly responds to issues
- Pet friendly! 2 friendly cats in residence currently, will consider additional pets
- 5 minutes to bars/eateries in Highland Park on Figueroa
- A short walk to: Debs regional park, Sycamore grove park, and a large grocery store
Close to the 110: short drive to Pasadena, DTLA, Echo Park, and Silver Lake

CONS:
- No washer/dryer. However, there is a laundromat a 1/2 block away so if you can make the trek this place might be for you.

ABOUT THE ROOMMATES:
#1: 29 year old medical student at USC. I work a lot and like the home to be a place a relax and recharge, and occasionally host a few friends. When not working I like getting outdoors to hike, ski, hit the beach, or golf. Always searching for the next great LA sandwich. Recently tried: the BLTA at Spoke Bicycle Cafe, highly recommended.

#2: Early 30s attorney. I like to run, hike, and be active. I work both at home and in the office but am quiet. I'm always up for trying out a new brewery, restaurant, or attempting a new recipe. I have 2 friendly cats.

ABOUT YOU:
- Organized with your bills (i.e. employed or student)
- Generally respectful of personal space and others' work schedules
- Not an aspiring DJ after 10pm at night

If you're interested please send an email with a bit about yourself. If it seems like a good match we'll reach out to set up a showing. Thanks!

Happy to send a video tour or additional pics of the home in its lived-in state, if desired.

Post Title: $2,100/ 2br - 1075ft2 - Charming Vintage Upper Unit Apartment in Dupl
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

$2,100 / 2br - 1075ft2 - Charming Vintage Upper Unit Apartment in Duplex--bright + spacious (Mt. Washington/Cypress Park/Highland Park)


Jeffries Avenue near Cypress Avenue
2BR / 1Ba 1075ft2 available now
duplex w/d in unit no smoking street parking 
AVAILABLE NOW. Nab this sweet rent-controlled pad while you can! It's all newly redone and won't stay on the market long.

CHARMING upper unit with all new paint and flooring throughout, brand new in-unit washer/dryer, this light, and bright 2 bedroom, 1 bath unfurnished apartment is quite SPACIOUS...1000+ square feet.

• awesome beautiful original moldings and built-in closets

• EACH BEDROOM HAS AN ATTACHED BONUS SUNROOM (could make a great office space, craft room, TV room, etc.)!

• the apartment is on the entire upper floor and feels like living in a single-family home (this permitted duplex was originally a single family dwelling)

• sunny dining room

• ceiling fans / air conditioner / wall heater

• in-unit stacked washer and dryer

• gas stove and fridge provided (water and gas covered by the landlord)

• tree-top views

Don't miss out on this seriously sweet place. A Must See!

This place is perfect for Los Angeles relocations--corporate or artistic (a lot of actors, writers, filmmakers, and musicians live in this neighborhood).

So centrally located--right by the 5, 110, 10, 2, and 134 freeways--it allows for easy commutes to the Hollywood and Burbank studios, Downtown LA, Pasadena, Glendale, etc.

Situated on an extra-wide street in Northeast Los Angeles across from Florence Nightingale Middle School (neighbors only on one side of the street and in a "safe zone").

It's located in MT. WASHINGTON, right on the border of Cypress Park, DOWNTOWN LA, and HIGHLAND PARK--considered one of the "HIPPEST" parts of LA--so there are tons of cultural things to do nearby.

• Short walking distance to the GOLDLINE Gold Line (only about 1/2 mile)

• 1 block to the nearest bus stop

• Hot restaurants are nearby

• Highland Park Bowl is just up Fig

• Footsies, a popular bar filming location site (see it on HBO's "Barry") is around the corner, only about 1/4 miles away

• Stone's throw to a drive-through Starbucks

• LA River biking just down the street

Also close to many of the iconic LA attractions: The Broad, Sunset Boulevard, Dodger Stadium, El Pueblo de Los Angeles, Walt Disney Concert Hall, Downtown, Cathedral of Our Lady of the Angels, Grand Park, Los Angeles City Hall, The Museum of Contemporary Art, Chinatown.

It really is a sweet L.A. existence in this section of Los Angeles.

We REQUIRE:

• Great Credit
• References
• Proven Income/Employment (recent income proof/pay stubs should ideally show 3x the monthly rent)
• NO Criminal Background nor Prior Evictions

Credit + Income/Employment verification fees: $45 per person or $75 per couple.

$2,100/month--1 year lease, $2,100 deposit.

If more than two adults are looking to live here, the same approval process applies for each additional adult/s plus $350.00 per month, per adult.

No subletting (including No AirBnB).

No smoking permitted in or on premises.

No pets.

The surrounding NELA areas are: Highland Park, Glassell Park, Cypress Park, Mt. Washington, Silver Lake, Eagle Rock, Atwater Village, Loz Feliz, Echo Park (Angelino Heights), DTLA (Little Tokyo/Arts District, Chinatown), Glendale, Pasadena, Hollywood.

Responsive and respectful property management.

Scheduling showings NOW. CALL (vs. email) Jassen to schedule showing: …[nine five one 837 zero one nine five]. I do get emails, but they tend to get lost in the shuffle and my response time will be much longer than if you just call or text. Thank you.

Post Title: Backhouse recording studio
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Hello! I am moving into a new home soon (June/July) in the Highland Park/Eagle Rock area. I’m looking for a partner or two who might be interested in sharing a back house recording studio. For example, you may be someone who would want to have access to a studio a couple days a week, say Saturdays and Sundays, but you don’t want to rent a space full-time. Or you might be a producer/songwriter who works from their apartment who could benefit from a more professional space some of the time.

If that sounds like you, reach out! If someone comes on board before I build out a space, it’s a great opportunity to offer your input to craft the space into something that works for both of us. My aesthetics are classic studio vibes, minimal-ish. Not like a dark cave - something creativity inducing.

I am a freelance recording engineer/producer, and have lots of great gear/instruments that you will have access to (assuming they are treated with care). Neumann tube mic, AEA ribbon mic, dynamic mics, Altec preamp, BAE Neve preamp, Adam A77X speakers, NS10MM speakers, TEAC tape machine, digital Mellotron, Roland Jupiter synth, Hohner Pianet (like Rhodes/Wurlitzer), Roland JU-06, Critter & Guitari synths, M-Audio Code49 midi controller, Apollo with tons of UAD plugins, Ultrawide computer monitor, vintage electric and acoustic guitars + basses, and more. TBD if I will be putting drums in the space.

For two 4-hour blocks per week: $400/month.
For three 4-hour blocks per week: $580/month.
For two 8-hour blocks per week: $700/month.
For three 8-hour blocks per week: $900/month.

I am slightly flexible on price, depending on your schedule and what (if any) gear of your own you’d like to add to the studio to share.

Space is very limited. I am looking for one or two people max. Studio will be available to work in by mid July at the latest.

The attached photo is of my former studio which was also shared, the location of the new studio will be in a standalone converted garage (with windows/power/air conditioning).

If you are interested, please reach out, tell me a bit about you, and I will send you some simple application questions to learn more about you and your studio needs. Thanks for looking!

Post Title: Awesome 2Bed+1Bath+2Parking! Newly Renovated *Your Private Escape*
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Property Description:

An attractive non-smoking building constructed in 1988. Recently renovated, spacious 2-bedroom, 1 full-bath apartment with 2 parking (tandem), in close proximity to Glendale, Atwater Village, Glassell Park, Los Feliz, Silver Lake, and Eagle Rock. Easy access to Interstate 5, 134, and 2 freeways.

Rental Features:

• 1988 Construction. Exquisitely Renovated first floor unit.
• Freshly painted with 2-tone designer accent color, new lighting fixtures throughout.
• Brand-new Kitchen cabinetry, Granite countertops, Stainless Steel sink & faucet.
• Brand-new Stainless Steel Refrigerator, Gas-stove, Microwave, & garbage disposal.
• New Tile-floor in kitchen, bathroom, and hallway.
• Formal Living room and both bedrooms with beautiful hardwood floor.
• Brushed-nickel ceiling fan in both bedrooms & Dinning Area.
• AC/heat in Living room and bedroom.
• Large gold-tone mirrored closet door and storage space.
• Security door entry to every apartment units.
• Automatic motion-sensor lights around the building for security.
• On-site 2-car parking (tandem). On-site Laundry.
• Owner pays for Hot & Cold water, sewer & trash, tenants pay for electricity & gas (stove).
• $2125/mo with $2125 security deposit on-approved-credit (OAC).
• 1-year Lease minimum. $35 application fee (non-refundable)/adult.
• Sorry, No-pets, No-smoking.

Post Title: Huge Bedroom/Studio with private entrance & 1/2 bath
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Hello, the room will be opening June 1st, and is located in a beautiful and picturesque highland park hill-house complete with views and private outdoor space/collective parking.

The room itself is long and large enough to be both a bedroom and a music studio (that's what I did there for a year), and has it's own entrance, outside hang area, 1/2 bath. And of course comes along with access to the amazing house with Central heat/AC, private outdoor space (a small putting green), washer dryer, and views a plenty. The other two housemates are two male songwriters/artists in their 30's, live upstairs from the studio, and are respectful and cleanly.

1700$ a month plus utilities, first and deposit due up front. Open to shorter stays but would prefer someone looking for a year lease to start.

Post Title: Bedroom available in craftman house
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

ABOUT THE ROOM:
The room has a large closet and two windows. You will be sharing a bathroom with another roommate (she is very clean and respectful). Please note the room will not be furnished. There is a 6-month minimum lease, which will then roll over to month-to-month.

ABOUT THE HOUSE:
The house is a 3BR/2BA craftsman in the heart of Highland Park. There is a washer/dryer in the unit and plenty of parking on the residential streets (Not at all like Hollywood where parking is a nightmare). The house is fully furnished but please note, the room itself is unfurnished. There is also a separate guest house in the back where there is also a tenant - so a total of three rooms in the house and one more in the separate back house.

LOCATION
We are located 1 block from the popular York Blvd where there are plenty of shops, restaurants, and nightlife. There is a supermarket called Super A, a 5 min walk away. There is also a Trader Joe’s, Sprouts, Target and Vons about a 5 min drive away. We are also 5 mins from Figueroa St and Colorado Blvd where there are plenty of shops, restaurants, etc.

CURRENT ROOMMATES:
We are women in our early-mid 30s. Our careers vary from bioresearch to film. We all work full time and both work remotely and onsite at this point (we are also fully vaccinated! woo!) A must for any new addition is that they are drama-free, reliable with bills and respectful of communal spaces as we have a very harmonious environment in the house.

PETS:
There is a 12lb senior dog in the guest house and a 35lb dog in the house so you must be dog-friendly. They are both calm, well behaved, and trained. But unfortunately, we cannot have any additional pets.

Post Title: Large house for rent - 3 bathrooms Central AC Washer Dryer Dishwasher
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

In brief: beautiful, spacious, centrally located, recently renovated, 1602 square foot house with 5 bed rooms / offices, 3 bathrooms, Nest-controlled central AC, dishwasher, washer/dryer, skylight, etc. available for rent June 1 or June 15. (Could also rent it with only 4 bedrooms for $600 less, see below).
I can show it most days, with 24+ hour notice. Please send me day(s)/time(s) that work for you.


Full description:
Large, ~1602 sqft, 2-story home featuring a large kitchen with skylight / breakfast bar / 5-burner gas stove / stainless steel dishwasher, lots of natural light through double pane windows for energy efficiency and noise reduction, and Nest controlled central AC (air-conditioning) and heating throughout (there are actually 2 full HVAC systems, one for upstairs and one for downstairs each with its own Nest thermostat you can control from your smartphone if you want to!), and the second floor features beautiful European Oak hardwood flooring and views including hillsides (and a distant peek of the Hollywood sign through the back bedroom window!).

This home has 5 rooms that could be used as bedrooms, work form home offices, etc. 2 are king-sized rooms, two queen-sized rooms, and a full-size room (there's plenty of room for more than just the bed in these rooms! And you could easily fit a king bed in the queen rooms, there just might not be room for nightstands on both sides of the bed if you do!).
1 king, 1 queen, and 1 full are upstairs as are 2 bathrooms (1 with bathtub, the other shower), + 1 king, 1 queen bedroom (with a large walk-in, Being John Malkovich closet) and 1 bathroom with shower on the ground floor.

Great location near 3 parks (including soccer fields, tennis courts, basketball hoops), the LA river / bike path, public transit (nearby buses to downtown LA, Burbank, etc. + a Gold Line Metro stop just 0.8 mi away), and short drives / Uber / Lyft to DTLA, Echo Park, Silverlake, Dodger Stadium, Highland Park, Glassell Park, Mt. Washington, Chinatown, Little Tokyo, Silver Lake Reservoir, etc. etc. ~3 minute drive to the closest 2 super markets, or ~10 minutes to Trader Joe's, Sprouts, or Whole Foods.

Looking for responsible, financially qualified tenants for a 1 year lease. Security deposit equal to 1 month rent.
Credit / background checks required, to be paid for by prospective tenants (after you've seen and liked the place of course).
Owner pays water and sewer only. Tenants responsible for gas, electric, etc.
No smoking / no vaping. No parking provided. No pets preferred.

I may need 24 hours or more notice before showing the unit to you, depending on the current tenants' schedules.

This home shares a lot with another detached house with a red wood fence separating the two houses. A small front yard with guava tree, citrus tree, and rose bushes is shared. A brick patio / terrace shaded by the large guava tree will be made in the next few months. There's also small patio spaces on the side of and behind the house.

There's a clothes washer dryer in a laundry room outside of the back of the house for your exclusive use.

If you are only interested in renting the house as a 4-bedroom (for $600 less), I've been thinking of converting the 5th bedroom off the back of the house into an accessory dwelling space, which would have its own entrance and would be walled off from the rest of the house. If this were to happen, the washer and dryer would be moved inside near the kitchen for you.



On Merced St, between Cypress Ave and San Fernando Rd, zip code: 90065

Post Title: ▶▶▶ CORNER ROOM with Amazing VIEW in Gorgeous MODERN House ☯ ❤
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

We're great people looking for a great roommate, all destined for greatness in a great house!!! How... Fantastic!

For rent is a corner room in a remodeled house and the view is incredible! New paint and you can see for miles. See pics. Close to Occidental college and right between cool areas on Colorado and York. Roommates include landlord and one tenant, both male, 30's and in film industry. Open to female or male tenants. 4 Bedroom House.



RENT
$1100/mo plus bills (bills range from $40-$230/mo)
- Month-to-Month lease
- $1100 security deposit

Bills (subsidized and split)

- 114.56 monthly average in 2019 - per person; subject to change
- Bills fluctuate as LADWP bill comes every other month, so total bills alternate between around $40 for non LADWP months, other times like $200 when the LADWP bill comes


ROOM
The Corner Room is arguably the best room in the house.
Private, quiet, comfortable, spacious
Fresh Paint
Million Dollar Views - Best view in the house. Spectacular hillside view of the valley below.
Furnished: super-soft and clean full bed, lighting, bookshelf, desk, good size closet
Solid door and thick, sound resistant walls. Designed for privacy and harmony with roommates, and plush carpet, too.
Fast WiFi, Ethernet in room
Bathroom was remodeled in 2016, shared primarily with one roommate, pictured below
12' x 11' not including closet or entryway. (3.65 x 3.35 meters)


Available Soon


HOUSE
- 4 bedrooms, 2100 sq. ft, 3 stories. Remodeled in 2012, all modern, all nice. Granite counters, stainless appliances, Hardwood floors downstairs, carpet upstairs, fresh paint. Unique.
- Views from every room
No pets, no smoking indoors. 420 friendly outdoors only.
Street parking out front, available 95% of the time. Backup spots close by.
On site Laundry
90041 Zip Code



ROOMMATES
Landlord and one tenant, 30’s, well-mannered, cool guys. Texas transplants in film industry. Very easy-going, nice, creative, drama-free people.
- Both Fully Vaccinated for Covid
- 1 does editing for movies / tv / web. Likes video games, sports, movies, Tex Mex.
- 1 also works in movies/ tv/ web video in post-production. Likes music, tech, Film, photography, writing.
- Currently 2 rooms are open, so there will be a total of 4 roommates in 4 bedrooms, 2 each to 2 upstairs bathrooms, plus there's a half bath downstairs.

*YOU*
- Female or male. Steady income or co-signer. Be looking for a place to stay long term.
- Tell us: Who are you? Where are you from? Why are you moving? How long have you been in LA? Working/student/other? What are you into? What are your hopes and dreams? What's your favorite song right now? , etc. Be Honest.
(Bonus points if you SEND SOCIAL MEDIA LINKS)

PROCESS
1. Tour of house, meet each other, get application.
2. Application / $25 background check fee / Credit Check / References / Paperwork
3. Sign lease paperwork and move in.
- Get started early, the paperwork sometimes takes a while

LOCATION
Eagle Rock between Colorado and York near restaurants, bars, vintage shops, record stores, Rock Clubs, and art galleries. It's a cool scene. Actually, 2 cool scenes and you get to live in the middle.
- Very safe neighborhood, many neighbors are intellectuals and creatives.
- Occidental College close by.
- Bus stop is a short walk down the hill.
- Trader Joe's, Vons, Sprouts, Organix all close by.

MORE DETAILS THAN YOU'LL EVER NEED
*** YES, this is a real house. Past roommate thought it was magazine photos, and emailed me anyway. Worked out well for everyone. ***
- Beautiful Modern House - built in 1989 - Remodeled in 2012-2013 & 2016
- Designed to keep roommates happy with each other, and insulated from each other! Also, it's pretty big so people are usually spaced out, plus everyone’s carefully selected to keep life easy.
- Very Comfortable, Don't rough it if you don't have to!
- Central air and heat, Million Dollar Views, High ceilings in living room, gas fireplace
- Lots of light without being blasted at sunset thanks to the hill. Oh yeah, it's on a hill.
- Quiet, safe neighborhood full of cool looking houses
- Easy access to 134,110 and 2, buses and subways
Eagle Rock proper, close enough to York Blvd in Highland Park to walk there

Post Title: Private Bath - Private Bed Room
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Hello,

I'm looking for a roommate / good fit, to rent my extra private bedroom with a private bathroom on a monthly basis. The apartment has great energy, safe, quiet and clean. Located between York Blvd and Fig. on Ave 59 close to HLP Gold Line Station.

Please note that the room would be unfurnished.
Room has brand new carpet and closet with big mirror slide doors.

Features:
Lots of natural light
Washing machine, Dryer
Large living room
Large kitchen
Netflix, Hulu
Outdoor area with plants and chairs

110 FWY - 10 minute drive to Downtown LA

TRAIN - Gold Line Highland Park Station - (4 min by foot)

WALKING distance to Supermarkets, Post Office, Bars and Restaurants

My ideal roommate would be someone who also thinks that a living space should be a clean and quiet sanctuary and who has lived with roommates before and is comfortable sharing a space and keeping it clean. Pescetarian/Vegetarian/Vegan preferred. Also, no couples, no overnight guests or full house all the time. I am looking for a someone who loves a positive vibe with a friendly living experience. Please be open minded and a good communicator.

This place is a relatively quiet most of the time to stay inspired for personal creative projects, personal grow, to rest/recharge, etc.

I'm not looking for someone with too much furniture!

A little about me, (mid30s) male from Berlin/Germany. I have tattoos, play guitar, 420 friendly but I don't smoke anything. No drinking. Musician and hobby photographer.
Nature and animal lover. Spiritual and quiet. I work during the week and on weekends on music, videos and photos. On my free time I like to explore the city, flea markets and art galleries, drink tea or coffee, listen to Ted talks or music and relax.

This will be month to month but I am willing to do a 3 month lease first and if after 90 days we can sign a new lease for 6 months or a year.

There's also a dog living with me. Hes a Shiba - he is very sweet and gentle and keeps to himself.

If that's sounds all good to you, please send me a message with a little about yourself including your social media handle.

Thank you and have a great day.

Move In Date: Mid May or beginning of June 2021
Rent: $800 -Month to Month
Rent total: ~$850 with utilities included
Security deposit (1 month's rent)
Utilities: $15/month for internet + monthly power, gas bill (varies by month)

Post Title: Detached Garage Studio
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This detached garage studio was completely remodeled in 2018. It includes a full kitchen and a bathroom with a shower. This home is part of a triplex located in a residential area in the heart of Los Angeles in the Monterey-Rose Hills neighborhood, 5 minutes away from Historic Highland Park and bordering South Pasadena, Hermon, and El Sereno. 10 minute drive to LAC/USC Medical Center and 15 minute drive to downtown Los Angeles.

*Full size kitchen with refrigerator, stove/oven, and microwave
*Bathroom with shower, toilet, and sink
*High ceiling with remote controlled ceiling fan
*Washer and dryer
*Central heating and air conditioning
*Walking distance from Ernest E. Debs Regional Park where you can see impressive views of downtown Los Angeles (great for a picnic, hiking, and running)

$2,000 per month with a 12 month lease.
One month security deposit + first month rent to move in.

Post Title: 1 Bedroom/1 Bath Apartment Available $1450
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

One Bedroom / One Bath / Living Room / Full Kitchen

Live Tour Here: https://youtu.be/9-ctxp0yXK4

One unit available in an eight unit building. Located between York and Figueroa, this charming apartment has unusually high ceilings, new laminate floors, paint, heater, windows (and lots of them). The building recently had it's plumping redone and the water pressure is great!

Living room has a small storage closet that was once, likely, used for a fold-out bed. Hallway has built-in shelving. Kitchen has a modest amount of shelving and new flooring. Comes furnished with a fridge and modest sized gas stove/range.

Dimensions are as follows:

Living Room: w11ft x d13' x h9'10

Closet: 1.1' x 6' x 9'10

Kitchen: 11' x 8.6' x 10'

Hallway: 2.2' x 6' x 10'

Bathroom: 7' x 4.9' x 10'

Bedroom (no closets): 10.7 x 8 x 10

Due to Covid19, all showings of the unit must be one at a time and be arranged with MGMT. I ask that everyone wears a mask.

Post Title: ***453 S Spring #1101-- 24/7 Creative Office Space in DTLA***
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! We are a real estate brokerage, if this space doesn’t meet your needs we may have or know about something else that does! Please go to our web-site www.dtlarealestate.com and submit your information on the Quick Contact Form or call/text now! And don't forget to follow us on social media at the links below, thank you!

Post Title: 525 S Broadway! DTLA GRND FLR SPACE+BASEMNT! High Ceiling! Central A/C
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Get it before it’s gone! Ask us the advantages of signing a five-year lease! For multiple reasons, the square feet are approximate and are not guaranteed, leases assume you measure the square feet of the space before leasing and approve of the calculation. Rent rate and terms on all of Quixotic Realty Inc's and affiliates advertisements and correspondences are subject to change so the final rent rate and terms are not valid or binding until a written lease has been signed by lessor and lessee. Please see our web-site for full disclosures. Lic#01753250

Post Title: 3 Bed in Prime W. Hollywood | Wood Inspired Flrs | UPGRADED | Specials

Feel immediately at home in these bright and spacious apartments located in prime West Hollywood. With the Sunset Strip across the street and Santa Monica Blvd close by, merely blocks to endless shops, restaurants, bars and entertainment. Our apartments have been totally remodeled with everything brand new! Our kitchen is captivating with black granite countertops, brand new cabinetry, as well as stainless steel refrigerator, oven, cooktop, microwave and dishwasher. Lots of natural light, with beautiful, modern hardwood laminate floors and central A/C with Nest thermostat. Amazing closet and storage space. Sizable Living + Dining area with recessed lighting. Huge Master consists of three large closets and a bathroom with double-sink vanity. Controlled entry, secured garage parking, swimming pool and laundry on-site.

$150 per Month for Parking w/ 1 Month Concession.

Post Title: Master Bedroom For Rent In Huge 2 Story House w/Walkin Closet+Backyard
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Master Bedroom For Rent In Huge 2 Story House with Walk-in Closet, Balcony, Garage, Washer, Dryer and Backyard. Granite countertop kitchen, hardwood flooring except in the bedrooms, dishwasher and washer and dryer in the house as well.

This room will be opening up April 1. It's the master bedroom and private bathroom in a large 4 bedroom house, comes with a private bath and walk-in closet. Laundry in the house and a spot in the garage. Located in Montecito Heights, Highland Park/South Pasadena/DTLA adjacent.

Your room is on the first of two floors, the other rooms are upstairs, and we don't go downstairs very often, so you basically will have the entire first floor to yourself most of the time. Roommates are mid 30s, super laid back, friendly and work in the music industry. We are progressive minded and whatever your age/race/sexual orientation/gender identity is, it would never be a an issue or even a consideration with us (as it should be). Dogs are cool as long as they are reasonably trained (housebroken, generally quiet).

We can fit 3 cars total in the driveway including the garage, there is also plenty of unrestricted street parking (no racing out to move your car at 6am).

The rent is $1225/mo with deposit. All that we ask is that you're responsible and clean.

Please contact me if you have any other questions

Post Title: $2,100/ 2br - 1075ft2 - Charming Vintage Upper Unit Apartment in Dupl
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

$2,100 / 2br - 1075ft2 - Charming Vintage Upper Unit Apartment in Duplex--bright + spacious (Mt. Washington/Cypress Park/Highland Park)


Jeffries Avenue near Cypress Avenue
2BR / 1Ba 1075ft2 available now
duplex w/d in unit no smoking street parking 
AVAILABLE NOW. Nab this sweet rent-controlled pad while you can! It's all newly redone and won't stay on the market long.

CHARMING upper unit with all new paint and flooring throughout, brand new in-unit washer/dryer, this light, and bright 2 bedroom, 1 bath unfurnished apartment is quite SPACIOUS...1000+ square feet.

• awesome beautiful original moldings and built-in closets

• EACH BEDROOM HAS AN ATTACHED BONUS SUNROOM (could make a great office space, craft room, TV room, etc.)!

• the apartment is on the entire upper floor and feels like living in a single-family home (this permitted duplex was originally a single family dwelling)

• sunny dining room

• ceiling fans / air conditioner / wall heater

• in-unit stacked washer and dryer

• gas stove and fridge provided (water and gas covered by the landlord)

• tree-top views

Don't miss out on this seriously sweet place. A Must See!

This place is perfect for Los Angeles relocations--corporate or artistic (a lot of actors, writers, filmmakers, and musicians live in this neighborhood).

So centrally located--right by the 5, 110, 10, 2, and 134 freeways--it allows for easy commutes to the Hollywood and Burbank studios, Downtown LA, Pasadena, Glendale, etc.

Situated on an extra-wide street in Northeast Los Angeles across from Florence Nightingale Middle School (neighbors only on one side of the street and in a "safe zone").

It's located in MT. WASHINGTON, right on the border of Cypress Park, DOWNTOWN LA, and HIGHLAND PARK--considered one of the "HIPPEST" parts of LA--so there are tons of cultural things to do nearby.

• Short walking distance to the GOLDLINE Gold Line (only about 1/2 mile)

• 1 block to the nearest bus stop

• Hot restaurants are nearby

• Highland Park Bowl is just up Fig

• Footsies, a popular bar filming location site (see it on HBO's "Barry") is around the corner, only about 1/4 miles away

• Stone's throw to a drive-through Starbucks

• LA River biking just down the street

Also close to many of the iconic LA attractions: The Broad, Sunset Boulevard, Dodger Stadium, El Pueblo de Los Angeles, Walt Disney Concert Hall, Downtown, Cathedral of Our Lady of the Angels, Grand Park, Los Angeles City Hall, The Museum of Contemporary Art, Chinatown.

It really is a sweet L.A. existence in this section of Los Angeles.

We REQUIRE:

• Great Credit
• References
• Proven Income/Employment (recent income proof/pay stubs should ideally show 3x the monthly rent)
• NO Criminal Background nor Prior Evictions

Credit + Income/Employment verification fees: $45 per person or $75 per couple.

$2,100/month--1 year lease, $2,100 deposit.

If more than two adults are looking to live here, the same approval process applies for each additional adult/s plus $350.00 per month, per adult.

No subletting (including No AirBnB).

No smoking permitted in or on premises.

No pets.

The surrounding NELA areas are: Highland Park, Glassell Park, Cypress Park, Mt. Washington, Silver Lake, Eagle Rock, Atwater Village, Loz Feliz, Echo Park (Angelino Heights), DTLA (Little Tokyo/Arts District, Chinatown), Glendale, Pasadena, Hollywood.

Responsive and respectful property management.

Scheduling showings NOW. CALL (vs. email) Jassen to schedule showing: …[nine five one 837 zero one nine five]. I do get emails, but they tend to get lost in the shuffle and my response time will be much longer than if you just call or text. Thank you.
