Post Title: 3br - 2 Rooms Available in 3Br/2Ba Apartment
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

ABOUT THE APARTMENT:
- 3Br/2Ba
- Lower unit in 3 unit triplex (one unit street-side, duplex off-street)
- fully remodeled in 2018 with new flooring, appliances, and fixtures
- 1 group of tenants since remodel
- High ceilings, tons of natural light
- 3 off-street parking spots
- Central AC/heating
- Large outdoor space (currently with picnic table, potted garden, and grill)
- Friendly, quiet neighbors

ABOUT THE ROOMS:

ROOM #1: Primary/Master Bedroom
Rent: $1040/mo + wifi/utilities ($60-90/mo depending on AC use)
- 13' x 10'
- Private full bathroom
- Largest and most quiet room in the house
ROOM #2
Rent: $900/mo + wifi/utilities
- 12’ x 9’
- Larger of the two secondary bedrooms
- NW facing windows w/ abundant natural light in the afternoon
- Bathroom shared with one person (me)

PROS:
- 12 mins to USC's Health Sciences Campus (LAC+USC, Keck Hospital) at all hours
- Great landlord who promptly responds to issues
- Pet friendly!
- 5 minutes to bars/eateries in Highland Park on Figueroa
- A short walk to: Debs regional park, Sycamore grove park, and a large grocery store
Close to the 110: short drive to Pasadena, DTLA, Echo Park, and Silver Lake

CONS:
- No washer/dryer. However, there is a laundromat a 1/2 block away so if you can make the trek this place might be for you.

ABOUT ME:
29 year old medical student at USC. I'll be entering my final year of school this summer. Current roommates are both graduating but this apartment is too good to give up. I'll be working a lot and like the home to be a place a relax and recharge, and occasionally host a few friends. When not working I like getting outdoors to hike, ski, hit the beach, or golf. Always searching for the next great LA sandwich. Recently tried: the BLTA at Spoke Bicycle Cafe, highly recommended.

Post Title: 6006 HILLANDALE DR This light & breezy 1950's vintage bungalow
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This light & breezy 1950's vintage bungalow offers sweeping views & privacy. Located at the head of a Cul--De-Sac & nestled on a 6,000 sq. ft. lot, you will enjoy the succulent gardens, a vegetable garden, Blueberry bushes & your very own Lemon tree. Plus a lovely patio with red brick fireplace, just perfect for outdoor dining & entertainment. And a Garden Shed for extra storage. The eat-in Kitchen features original solid pine cabinetry, mosaic tiling, plus stainless steel dishwasher & stove. With handy direct access to the patio from the kitchen. The spacious Living Room has white oak hardwood floors which continue throughout the house. The main bedroom is spacious & filled with light, with a door leading to the garden. The second bedroom is also very light with lovely views. The bathroom has a Spa Tub & white vanity. Washer & Dryer are located in the two car attached garage, which also has direct access to the patio. Central heat & A/C. All exterior architectural trim has been freshly refinished & painted. Move into this peaceful property situated just minutes from Highland Park's best restaurant's & night life.

Description:

LOCATED IN THE THRIVING ENTERTAINMENT DISTRICT OF PARAMOUNT STUDIOS/HOLLYWOOD/HANCOCK PARK ADJACENT, 717 N. Highland Ave., these carefully designed Loft spaces provide a true Live - Work opportunity as allowed under the commercial C2 Zone. This unit features 3-level (town homes) lofts approximately 2,000 usable sq., ft. in size with open floor layout and appx 24 ft high ceiling emphasizing light, space and contemporary design. This exclusive Live/Work Loft features hardwood maple floors, separate heating/air conditioning systems, exposed block walls, double insulated wood windows with a view, large exterior decks, vaulted ceilings with open beam construction, steel interior stairways. Kitchen and bathroom are fully equipped with new high-standard appliances and fixtures. Each individual unit has private two-car garage/work space with 11-ft ceilings. The building is fully placed with an exterior gate. Each unit is wired for today's security and communication intercom.

Post Title: **453 Spring St #321-DTLA: Creative Office Space **
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! We are a real estate brokerage, if this space doesn’t meet your needs we may have or know about something else that does! Please go to our web-site www.dtlarealestate.com and submit your information on the Quick Contact Form or call/text now! And don't forget to follow us on social media at the links below, thank you!

Twitter: @dtlarealty
Facebook: @dtla4ever

Post Title: 453 Spring #1029- 24/7 Access Creative Office Space in DTLA!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! Post Title: 523 S Broadway! DTLA GRND FLR SPACE+BASEMNT! High Ceilngs! Central A/C
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Post Title: **453 Spring St #321-DTLA: Creative Office Space **
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! We are a real estate brokerage, if this space doesn’t meet your needs we may have or know about something else that does! Please go to our web-site www.dtlarealestate.com and submit your information on the Quick Contact Form or call/text now! And don't forget to follow us on social media at the links below, thank you!

Post Title: **Promenade Plaza! 716 W 1st ! ~F~A~N~T~A~S~T~I~C~RETAIL/OFFICE!**
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This space is bank space/credit union space. DTLA RETAIL/OFFICE/MEDICAL SPACE for lease in the busy and well-known PROMENADE PLAZA! This property is located on the CORNER OF 1ST/HOPE ST right across the street from the DWP Building, Disney Hall, Music Center, and a block away from the mega Frank Gehry development that will soon be completed! This property is also a short walk to the soon to be completed new subway station! The property is a residential condo building upstairs known as the Promenade Towers and the retail below where the space is available is known again as the Promenade Plaza. Share the plaza with a great tenant mix including a Subway, a yoga studio, a cafe, an acupuncture & herbal medicine office, a nail salon, a physical therapist and two restaurants! Unit 716 is a CORNER SPACE and has immediate visibility from the elevator from the parking garage. As a corner space it gets natural light from two sides, and the unit has TONS OF WINDOWED FRONTAGE that could be used as advertising space. It features it's on spot for signage and tons of outdoor seating available in the plaza. This space was previously occupied by a CREDIT UNION so it's basically built out like a BANK SPACE. The photos show the space as it is presently. Another bank would be an excellent fit, but ANY PERMITTED USE IS POSSIBLE! Per negotiation, landlord can deliver the space as an empty blank shell for a tenant wishing to use the space for a different use, such as medical office, dental office, and more. For well tenants who are well established and have excellent finances, landlord can, per negotiation, contribute to tenant improvements, aside from a basic demo. It's also possible to subdivide the space into two units roughly 1100sf and 2000sf each. The space currently has central HVAC, 2 private bathrooms, a server room, a lunch room, a teller station area, and a huge open area with divisions for desks. Retail tenants have 24/7 access to the space and plaza. There’s a parking garage for the building as well where people can park for a daily fee of $10 of $200 monthly. It is also possible for retail tenants to validate their customers parking as well! Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: 453 Spring # 801-Spring Arts Tower: Small Creative Office 24/7 Access!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Post Title: 453 Spring #201 - Incredibly Cool Creative Space!7 offices, conf rm+++
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA's Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There's also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a cafe on the 9th floor (Spring St Cafe), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There's also on-site management and maintenance. There's shared mens, womens, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access.

THIS IS THE COOLEST & MOST UNIQUE SPACE IN THE BUILDING! And the biggest, for that matter. Space has POLISHED CEMENT FLOORS along with GORGEOUS WINDOWS. The space is a CORNER UNIT and the CONFERENCE ROOM (yes there is one) is in the corner. Incredible picture frame wall and column molding give this space a historic, elegant look, and the raw brick and glass office walls lend itself to a HIGH TECH FEELING ENVIRONMENT. There's AMAZING SKYLIGHTS that were discovered during renovation. There's 7 PRIVATE OFFICES! Reception area as well. Photos speak for themselves! GREAT NATURAL LIGHT! There is a HIDDEN SPEAK-EASY BAR/LUNCHROOM in the space as well, and it's complete with a kitchen, full bar, and refrigerator! The bookshelf is a secret door! Last but not least, there's a HUGE MEDIA ROOM as well along with an additional private room in there.

Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: 525 S Broadway! DTLA GRND FLR SPACE+BASEMNT! High Ceiling! Central A/C
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Beautiful ground floor space available FOR LEASE! This property is located in DTLA’s Fashion District in the famous Santee Passage (aka as Santee Court). So basically this space is behind the building on Los Angeles St in the courtyard, and this courtyard is where Santee St starts. There’s tons and tons of residents upstairs in multiple buildings! This is arguably the best area of the Fashion District and definitely the biggest residential hub in the Fashion District. 9th St and Los Angeles St is probably the most desirable area for showrooms as the Cooper Building is located there. This space is situated on Los Angeles St between 7th St and 8th St, and the Historic Core District, and all the amenities of the Historic Core, is only a few blocks away! So! Anyway this space is accessible from the side walk at the front end off Los Angeles St, shown in the photos. At this entrance there’s a food court and at the end of the passage a minim-mart. The other access point is from Santee Street. This space features windowed frontage, a front reception area, a conference room/office, a back open area with kitchenette, and a back private office. There’s also a storage closest. There’s built in desks that can be kept or removed, per negotiation. Excellent space with exposed ceilings, central HVAC, 24/7 access, great natural light, stylish glass walls, and more. This space shares a common area set of bathrooms on the second floor upstairs. Post Title: BEAUTIFUL, PEACEFUL, SECLUDED 29.5 ACRE PROPERTY
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

PRICE REDUCED!!…...Only four miles from interstate 10, this beautiful, peaceful and quiet 29.5 acre property is located in Southern California, Riverside County in the Banning/Beaumont area. The property is right next to and overlooking the 9000 acre Potrero Wildlife Preserve. It is very private and secluded and would be the perfect place for a Horse Ranch/Training facility, an Animal Rescue facility, a Professional Dog Kennel/Training facility, a Rehabilitation Facility or just a great investment property.
This scenic property offers spectacular views of the mountains, the canyons, and the State Wildlife Preserve. There are numerous building sites so it would be the perfect place to build your dream home and be able to bring all of your animals with you. This rare find already has Water and Power with a Banning City Water meter and So Cal Edison meter and it also includes a 5000-gallon water tank. The whole property is completely fenced for livestock.
It is only four miles from the interstate 10 and Highland Springs Ave shopping district that includes Supermarkets, Banks, Restaurants, Gas Stations, CA State Highway Patrol, Loma Linda Medical Plaza, Home Depot, Walmart and Best Buy plus many other businesses and stores.
It is within one to two hours from Los Angeles, San Diego, and Orange County. It is around thirty to forty-five minutes from three nice lakes for fishing and water sports, Lake Perris, Diamond Valley Lake, Lake Skinner and, Palm Springs, Morongo Casino/ Hotel, and the Cabazon Shopping Mall. It is also close to all of the famous Southern California Amusement parks and fun places like Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Universal Studios, and all of our beautiful, sunny Southern California beaches. It is about 3 hours from Las Vegas and Phoenix areas...……………***(PRICE IS $499,000.00)
Give us a call if you would like more information or to set up a showing...…... CALL DAN...…….. show contact info )……..Leave a clear message with your name and phone number and the best time to call you back and we will give you a call right away.

Post Title: ***453 S Spring #1114-- Small Creative Work Space with 24/7 Access***
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! We are a real estate brokerage, if this space doesn’t meet your needs we may have or know about something else that does! Please go to our web-site www.dtlarealestate.com and submit your information on the Quick Contact Form or call/text now! And don't forget to follow us on social media at the links below, thank you!

Post Title: 453 Spring # 801-Spring Arts Tower: Small Creative Office 24/7 Access!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! Post Title: **Promenade Plaza! 716 W 1st ! ~F~A~N~T~A~S~T~I~C~RETAIL/OFFICE!**
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This space is bank space/credit union space. DTLA RETAIL/OFFICE/MEDICAL SPACE for lease in the busy and well-known PROMENADE PLAZA! This property is located on the CORNER OF 1ST/HOPE ST right across the street from the DWP Building, Disney Hall, Music Center, and a block away from the mega Frank Gehry development that will soon be completed! This property is also a short walk to the soon to be completed new subway station! The property is a residential condo building upstairs known as the Promenade Towers and the retail below where the space is available is known again as the Promenade Plaza. Share the plaza with a great tenant mix including a Subway, a yoga studio, a cafe, an acupuncture & herbal medicine office, a nail salon, a physical therapist and two restaurants! Unit 716 is a CORNER SPACE and has immediate visibility from the elevator from the parking garage. As a corner space it gets natural light from two sides, and the unit has TONS OF WINDOWED FRONTAGE that could be used as advertising space. It features it's on spot for signage and tons of outdoor seating available in the plaza. This space was previously occupied by a CREDIT UNION so it's basically built out like a BANK SPACE. The photos show the space as it is presently. Another bank would be an excellent fit, but ANY PERMITTED USE IS POSSIBLE! Per negotiation, landlord can deliver the space as an empty blank shell for a tenant wishing to use the space for a different use, such as medical office, dental office, and more. For well tenants who are well established and have excellent finances, landlord can, per negotiation, contribute to tenant improvements, aside from a basic demo. It's also possible to subdivide the space into two units roughly 1100sf and 2000sf each. The space currently has central HVAC, 2 private bathrooms, a server room, a lunch room, a teller station area, and a huge open area with divisions for desks. Retail tenants have 24/7 access to the space and plaza. There’s a parking garage for the building as well where people can park for a daily fee of $10 of $200 monthly. It is also possible for retail tenants to validate their customers parking as well! Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: 453 Spring #201 - Incredibly Cool Creative Space!7 offices, conf rm+++
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA's Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There's also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a cafe on the 9th floor (Spring St Cafe), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There's also on-site management and maintenance. There's shared mens, womens, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access.

THIS IS THE COOLEST & MOST UNIQUE SPACE IN THE BUILDING! And the biggest, for that matter. Space has POLISHED CEMENT FLOORS along with GORGEOUS WINDOWS. The space is a CORNER UNIT and the CONFERENCE ROOM (yes there is one) is in the corner. Incredible picture frame wall and column molding give this space a historic, elegant look, and the raw brick and glass office walls lend itself to a HIGH TECH FEELING ENVIRONMENT. There's AMAZING SKYLIGHTS that were discovered during renovation. There's 7 PRIVATE OFFICES! Reception area as well. Photos speak for themselves! GREAT NATURAL LIGHT! There is a HIDDEN SPEAK-EASY BAR/LUNCHROOM in the space as well, and it's complete with a kitchen, full bar, and refrigerator! The bookshelf is a secret door! Last but not least, there's a HUGE MEDIA ROOM as well along with an additional private room in there.

Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: 525 S Broadway! DTLA GRND FLR SPACE+BASEMNT! High Ceiling! Central A/C
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Get it before it’s gone! Ask us the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Description:

Are you tired of searching for a location for your business? Do you need some assistance? If you are reading this, then you most likely do. Whether you are relocating from your current space or looking for a space for your new business, we are here to help!

Our database contains thousands of properties ranging from 1,000sf to 50,000+sf and includes all properties from popular online sites and many more that are NOT included on those sites! We are available Monday through Friday, so please let us know your availability and we can set up a time to tour your future spot.

Please provide the following information when contacting us and we can get started on finding your new location for your business:

Name
Contact number/Email
Type of business to be performed in the space(NO CANNABIS INQUIRIES PLEASE)

650+ credit score is needed or be prepared to put at least 2-3 months rent down as security deposit.
Rent starts at $2500/month
LEASE TERM IS 3+ years

Call/Text 213-718-3067 or reply to this ad! Inquiries without the above information cannot be assisted. (NO CANNABIS INQUIRIES PLEASE)

We can also assist you in buying and selling property!

Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you!

We hope you, your family, and friends are staying safe and healthy.

Beautiful ground floor space available FOR LEASE! This property is located in DTLA’s Fashion District in the famous Santee Passage (aka as Santee Court). BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

This stunning space has been freshly cleaned up and painted. The ceilings are an estimated 18′ HIGH CEILINGS with large windows stretching to the ceiling! MASSIVE AMOUNTS OF NATURAL LIGHT flood this space, and what a BEAUTIFUL SPACE it is. It features an existing functioning VENT/HOOD along with multiple sinks. There’s a countertop that opens from the kitchen/cooking area right into the space. INFINITE POSSIBILITIES for restaurant/café spaces for this space. Located in an EXCELLENT LOCATION with TONS OF DRIVE-BY TRAFFIC! As far as permits go, due diligence has yet to have been done regarding whether they are active or not. Yet, for qualified Lessee’s Lessor may consider a free rent period if any permit work is needed. Space features an ADA size bathroom (Lessee to verify) along with a small bathroom in the kitchen. There’s a second floor storage area as well that’s approximately 120sf, and is included in the quoted rent rate. I imagine a restaurant/café concept that does a lot of take-out and delivery would find this opportunity the most attractive since there is limited space for seating. Get it before someone else comes and takes this hot opportunity off the market! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! Post Title: **453 Spring St #321-DTLA: Creative Office Space **
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! We are a real estate brokerage, if this space doesn’t meet your needs we may have or know about something else that does!
